episodes.title: The Fall of Thjazi Fang
episodes.scene_description: The city of Dol-Makjar is heavy with tension. Word has spread that the war hero Thjazi Fang is to be executed today. Friends, family, and enemies gather in the square as the orcish custom of farramh begins. The air is thick with grief, political intrigue, and the weight of secrets yet to surface...

episodes.title: Broken Wing
episodes.scene_description: In the aftermath of Thjazi Fang's execution, the party reels from the chaos that erupted. Wounds are fresh, alliances are tested, and the broken city of Dol-Makjar demands answers. Arrows still litter the ground as you tend to the fallen...

episodes.title: The Snipping of Shears
episodes.scene_description: Secrets are unraveled as the party investigates the conspiracy behind the execution. Dark forces move in the shadows of Dol-Makjar, and every thread pulled reveals another tangled web of betrayal...

episodes.title: Stone-Faced
episodes.scene_description: The investigation deepens as stone walls close in around the party. Facing stoic opposition and hidden truths, every face they encounter could be friend or foe in the political landscape of Aramán...

episodes.title: Branching Paths
episodes.scene_description: The party faces a crossroads. Multiple leads pull them in different directions, and the choices they make now will shape the course of their journey through Aramán. Trust is a currency in short supply...

episodes.title: Knives and Thorns
episodes.scene_description: Danger lurks around every corner as the party navigates treacherous terrain and even more treacherous politics. Blades flash in the dark, and the thorns of conspiracy draw blood...

episodes.title: On the Scent
episodes.scene_description: Following clues and tracking quarry, the party picks up a trail that leads them deeper into the mysteries of Aramán. The hunt is on, and the prey may not be what they expect...

episodes.title: Fanged Revenge
episodes.scene_description: Vengeance drives the party forward as old wounds demand settling. The fangs of the past bite hard, and the cycle of revenge threatens to consume everything in its path...

episodes.title: To the Hounds!
episodes.scene_description: The chase intensifies as hunters become the hunted. The party must outrun, outwit, and outfight those who would see them silenced. The hounds are baying, and time is running short...

episodes.title: Blood for Blood
episodes.scene_description: Violence begets violence as the party confronts the cost of their journey. Blood debts are called in, and the weight of every choice made thus far comes crashing down...

episodes.title: Make Merry
episodes.scene_description: A rare moment of respite as the party finds cause for celebration amidst the turmoil. But even in merry-making, the shadows of Aramán are never far away, and revelry can reveal as much as interrogation...

episodes.title: The Giant's Belt
episodes.scene_description: The party ventures into the wilderness near the Giant's Belt, a region of ancient power and untamed nature. The landscape itself seems to test their resolve as greater forces stir...

episodes.title: Seeking Sanctuary
episodes.scene_description: Desperate for safety, the party seeks sanctuary from the mounting dangers that pursue them. But in Aramán, even sacred ground may not offer the protection they need...

episodes.title: A Bridge Too Far
episodes.scene_description: The party reaches a critical juncture — a bridge too far in every sense. The culmination of their journey through Aramán's tangled politics and ancient mysteries brings them to a point of no return...
